title: 1stMate.Evidence
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Attlebrox>>
<<NameTag|moveLeftEdge>>
<<Portrait|1stMate_happy>>
Hello, Captain.
<</Textbox>>


    <<if $Clue1Found is true and ($Clue1Owner1 == $SUSPECT and $Clue1Owner1 == "Attlebrox")>>
        [[Ask about $Clue1|1stMate.Question]]
    <<elseif $Clue1Found is true and ($Clue1Owner1 != $SUSPECT and $Clue1Owner1 is "Attlebrox")>>
        [[Ask about $Clue1|1stMate.Random]]
    <<elseif $Clue1Found is true and ($Clue1Owner2 is "Attlebrox")>>
        [[Ask about $Clue1|1stMate.EvidenceB]]
    <<elseif $Clue1Found is true and ($Clue1Owner1 != "Attlebrox" and $Clue1Owner2 != "Attlebrox")>>
        [[Ask about $Clue1|1stMate.RedirectClue]]
    <<endif>>

    <<if $Clue2Found is true and ($Clue2Owner1 == $SUSPECT and $Clue2Owner1 is "Attlebrox")>>
        [[Ask about $Clue2|1stMate.Question2]]
    <<elseif $Clue2Found is true and ($Clue2Owner1 != $SUSPECT and $Clue2Owner1 is "Attlebrox")>>
        [[Ask about $Clue2|1stMate.Random2]]
    <<elseif $Clue2Found is true and ($Clue2Owner2 is "Attlebrox")>>
        [[Ask about $Clue2|1stMate.EvidenceB2]]
    <<elseif $Clue2Found is true and ($Clue2Owner1 != "Attlebrox" and $Clue2Owner2 != "Attlebrox")>>
        [[Ask about $Clue2|1stMate.RedirectClue2]]
    <<endif>>

    <<if $Clue3Found is true and ($Clue3Owner1 == $SUSPECT and $Clue3Owner1 is "Attlebrox")>>
        [[Ask about $Clue3|1stMate.Question3]]
    <<elseif $Clue3Found is true and ($Clue3Owner1 != $SUSPECT and $Clue3Owner1 is "Attlebrox")>>
        [[Ask about $Clue3|1stMate.Random3]]
    <<elseif $Clue3Found is true and ($Clue3Owner2 is "Attlebrox")>>
        [[Ask about $Clue3|1stMate.EvidenceB3]]
    <<elseif $Clue3Found is true and ($Clue3Owner1 != "Attlebrox" and $Clue3Owner2 != "Attlebrox")>>
        [[Ask about $Clue3|1stMate.RedirectClue3]]
    <<endif>>


    <<if $Clue4Found is true and ($Clue4Owner1 == $SUSPECT and $Clue4Owner1 is "Attlebrox")>>
        [[Ask about $Clue4|1stMate.Question4]]
    <<elseif $Clue4Found is true and ($Clue4Owner1 != $SUSPECT and $Clue4Owner1 is "Attlebrox")>>
        [[Ask about $Clue4|1stMate.Random4]]
    <<elseif $Clue4Found is true and ($Clue4Owner2 is "Attlebrox")>>
        [[Ask about $Clue4|1stMate.EvidenceB4]]
    <<elseif $Clue4Found is true and ($Clue4Owner1 != "Attlebrox" and $Clue4Owner2 != "Attlebrox")>>
        [[Ask about $Clue4|1stMate.RedirectClue4]]
    <<endif>>

<<if $Clue5Found is true and ($Clue5Owner1 == $SUSPECT and $Clue5Owner1 is "Attlebrox")>>
        [[Ask about $Clue5|1stMate.Question5]]
    <<elseif $Clue5Found is true and ($Clue5Owner1 != $SUSPECT and $Clue5Owner1 is "Attlebrox")>>
        [[Ask about $Clue5|1stMate.Random5]]
    <<elseif $Clue5Found is true and ($Clue5Owner2 is "Attlebrox")>>
        [[Ask about $Clue5|1stMate.EvidenceB5]]
    <<elseif $Clue5Found is true and ($Clue5Owner1 != "Attlebrox" and $Clue5Owner2 != "Attlebrox")>>
        [[Ask about $Clue5|1stMate.RedirectClue5]]
    <<endif>>



[[That's all.|1stMate.Bye]]

title: 1stMate.Bye
body:
<<if $1stMateLoyalty == -1>>
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Attlebrox>>
<<NameTag|moveLeftEdge>>
<<Portrait|1stMate_neutral>>
Be gone, I've matters to attend to.
<</Textbox>>

<<elseif $1stMateLoyalty == 0>>
<<Speak Audio FFarewell>>
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Attlebrox>>
<<NameTag|moveLeftEdge>>
<<Portrait|1stMate_neutral>>
Farewell, Captain.
<</Textbox>>

<<elseif $1stMateLoyalty == 1>>
<<Speak Audio FFarewell>>
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Attlebrox>>
<<NameTag|moveLeftEdge>>
<<Portrait|1stMate_neutral>>
Good luck, Captain. I know you will guide us through this.
<</Textbox>>
<<endif>>

//End of conversation

title: 1stMate.Question
body:
<<Speak Audio FCertainly>>
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Attlebrox>>
<<NameTag|moveLeftEdge>>
<<Portrait|1stMate_Neutral>>
Certainly! I do believe that $Clue1 is mine, sir. If I may ask, why is it in your possession?
<</Textbox>>

[[Found it in $Clue1Location.|1stMate.Clue]]

[[None of your business.|1stMate.Upset]]

[[That's all.|1stMate.Bye]]

title: 1stMate.Clue
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Attlebrox>>
<<NameTag|moveLeftEdge>>
<<Portrait|1stMate_Neutral>>
Is that so? I ususally keep that around just in case I'd need it. As for why it was where you found it, I do not know.
<</Textbox>>

[[This $Clue1 does what?|1stMate.Key]]

[[Related to $VICTIM's death?|1stMate.Upset2]]

title: 1stMate.Upset
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Attlebrox>>
<<NameTag|moveLeftEdge>>
<<Portrait|1stMate_mad>>
That belongs to me, you can't even tell me why you have it? Unbelievable...
<</Textbox>>

<<UpdateChatBubble 1stMate false>>
<< if visited ("1stMate.Loyalty") is true>>

[[EmptyA]]

<<else>>

[[1stMate.Loyalty]]

<<endif>>


//End of conversation

title: 1stMate.Key
body:
<<Speak Audio FHmm>>
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Attlebrox>>
<<NameTag|moveLeftEdge>>
<<Portrait|1stMate_neutral>>
Hmm. Many things. It's simple, but versatile.
<</Textbox>>

<<set $FirstMatetestimony6 to "Attlebrox has knowledge about" + $Clue1>>
<<AddEntry TestimonyCanvas $FirstMatetestimony6 1stMate_happy>>
<<UpdateChatBubble 1stMate false>>
<<NewTest TestimonyCanvas>>
//Clue Key Dialogue

[[1stMate.Bye]]

body:
<<if $CookLoyalty == -1>>

<<Name|Jorji>>
<<NameTag|moveLeftEdge>>

What do you want?

<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Jorji>>

I hope all's going well.

Ayy Cap, how's it going?
<</Textbox>>
<<endif>>


    <<if $Clue1Found is true and ($Clue1Owner1 == $SUSPECT and $Clue1Owner1 is "Jorji")>>

    <<if $Clue3Found is true and ($Clue3Owner1 == $SUSPECT and $Clue3Owner1 is "Jorji")>>

    <<if $Clue4Found is true and ($Clue4Owner1 == $SUSPECT and $Clue4Owner1 is "Jorji")>>

    <<elseif $Clue4Found is true and ($Clue4Owner1 != $SUSPECT and $Clue4Owner1 is "Jorji")>>

    <<elseif $Clue4Found is true and ($Clue4Owner1 != "Jorji" and $Clue4Owner2 != "Jorji")>>

<<if $Clue5Found is true and ($Clue5Owner1 == $SUSPECT and $Clue5Owner1 is "Jorji")>>

title: Cook.Bye
body:
<<if $CookLoyalty == -1>>
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Jorji>>
<<NameTag|moveLeftEdge>>
<<Portrait|Cook_Neutral>>
Picsciari.
<</Textbox>>

<<elseif $CookLoyalty == 1>>
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Jorji>>
<<NameTag|moveLeftEdge>>
<<Portrait|Cook_Happy>>
You got this, Cap. Find the murderer and we can go home.
<</Textbox>>

<<elseif $CookLoyalty == 0>>
<<Speak Audio CYea>>
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Jorji>>
<<NameTag|moveLeftEdge>>
<<Portrait|Cook_neutral>>
Yea, you do that.
<</Textbox>>
<<endif>>

//End of conversation

title: Cook.Question
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Jorji>>
<<NameTag|moveLeftEdge>>
<<Portrait|Cook_neutral>>
Hey, where'd you find this? I was looking all over for it.
<</Textbox>>


[[When you last saw it? |Cook.Clue]]

[[Looking all over?|Cook.Upset]]

[[That's all.|Cook.Bye]]

title: Cook.Clue
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Jorji>>
<<NameTag|moveLeftEdge>>
<<Portrait|cook_neutral>>
I saw that $Clue1 before the, uh, 'incident'.
<</Textbox>>

[[Who could have taken it?|Cook.Key]]

[[Well, that's convenient.|Cook.UpsetAlt]]

title: Cook.Upset
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Jorji>>
<<NameTag|moveLeftEdge>>
<<Portrait|cook_mad>>
I don't appreciate being called a liar, Capitano.
<</Textbox>>

<<UpdateChatBubble Cook false>>
 << if visited ("Cook.Loyalty") is true>>

[[EmptyB]]

    <<else>>
[[Cook.Loyalty]]
<<endif>>
//End of conversation

    <<if $randomM3 == "true">>

<<endif>>

title: Medic.RedirectClue5
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Cerys>>
<<NameTag|moveLeftEdge>>
<<Portrait|Medic_Neutral>>
$Clue5Owner1 and $Clue5Owner2 know more about that than I do, ask them.
<</Textbox>>
<<UpdateChatBubble Medic false>>

title: Medic.EvidenceBCon
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Cerys>>
<<NameTag|moveLeftEdge>>
<<Portrait|Medic_Neutral>>
Captain, that $Clue1 has been used by all of us at some point.
<</Textbox>>

[[Yes, but who is seen it?|Medic.EvidenceClue]]

[[No kidding.|Medic.EvidenceBloy]]

title: Medic.EvidenceClue
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Cerys>>
<<NameTag|moveLeftEdge>>
<<Portrait|Medic_Neutral>>
I don't recall, like I said I have seen just about everyone with it. If there is anything else you'd like to know about it I am here.
<</Textbox>>
<<UpdateChatBubble Medic false>>

title: Medic.EvidenceBloy
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Cerys>>
<<NameTag|moveLeftEdge>>
<<Portrait|Medic_Neutral>>
If you are going to waste my time then you should go pester someone else!
<</Textbox>>
<<UpdateChatBubble Medic false>>

<< if visited ("Medic.Loyalty") is true>>

[[EmptyD]]
    
    <<else>>

[[Medic.Loyalty]]

    <<endif>>

title: Medic.EvidenceB5
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Cerys>>
<<NameTag|moveLeftEdge>>
<<Portrait|Medic_Neutral>>
Yes, that's a $Clue5. Why do you ask?
<</Textbox>>

[[Who's $Clue5 is this?|Medic.EvidenceBCon5]]

[[I'm asking the questions!|Medic.EvidenceBloy]]

body:

<<Name|Saira>>
<<NameTag|moveLeftEdge>>
<<Portrait|Pilot_Neutral>>
Hell if I know. Try $Clue4Owner1's or $Clue4Owner2's.
<</Textbox>>
<<UpdateChatBubble Pilot false>>

title: Pilot.EvidenceB
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<Name|Saira>>
<<NameTag|moveLeftEdge>>
<<Portrait|Pilot_neutral>>
Yeah, that's a $Clue1, I've seen it before.
<</Textbox>>

[[Tell me more.|Pilot.EvidenceBCon]]

[[How? You barely even leave the bridge.|Pilot.EvidenceBloy]]
